DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( Nonpregnant pregnant participant participant ) : Caucasian race Age 1935 Body mass index ( BMI ) prepregnancy BMI ( If currently pregnant ) < 28 kg/m2 Inclusion Criteria ( Additional criterion pregnant participant ) : Singleton pregnancy 20 < 36 week pregnant study participation No pregnancy complication Exclusion Criteria ( Nonpregnant pregnant participant ) : BMI prepregnancy BMI â‰¥ 28 kg/m2 Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection Diagnosed eat disorder Malabsorption disease Diabetes Elevated diastolic blood pressure ( > 110 mm/Hg ) Steroid use Substance abuse history Current use medication know influence vitamin D calcium homeostasis Plans travel low latitude 20day study period Plans become pregnant study period ( nonpregnant ) Refuses discontinue tan bed use study period Refuses discontinue vitamin mineral supplement use study period ( nonpregnant ) Exclusion Criteria ( Additional criterion pregnant participant ) : Gestational diabetes Pregnancy hypertension
